text: Robert René Gaudreau (born March 8, 1944) is an American former ice hockey defenseman and Olympian. Gaudreau played with Team USA at the 1968 Winter Olympics held in Grenoble, France.Robert Gaudreau Sr at Sports Reference He previously played for the Brown Bears at Brown University. He is the father of Rob Gaudreau. ==Awards and honors== {| class="wikitable" ! Award ! title: Robert Gaudreau
